summary: Drunk fallen Nightingale follower. Found in Riften.
descriptionHtml:
Nikandros - Means \"victory of a man\" from the Greek elements (nike) \"victory\" and (andros) \"of a man\".

Found in Riften.
When you first meet him he will be in rags and have mesh issues with his head. This is unfix-able at this time.
Simply give him a amulet or ring and he will equip his Nightingale armor. Or use the \"You could dress better\" command in the \"You know...\" menu in UFO.

He wields a ebony dagger of paralyzing and carries a lot of mead, wine and ale along with more food. He levels with you.
Perks include, Shadow Warrior (which he does use in battle), Silent, Lightfoot, Silent roll, and can use the shouts, disarm and elemental fury.
His class and battle style is assassin. 

More mods by me
Delaney of the Pure Heart: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17988
Dragkol Dragonpriest: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=18199
author: pokemoneg
